snippet: Celgene, a New Jersey biotechnology company, will pay $232 a share for Receptos, which is developing a drug for autoimmune diseases.
abstract: Biotech firm Celgene agrees to buy Receptos for $7.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: Celgene, a New Jersey biotechnology company, will pay $232 a share for Receptos, which is developing a drug for autoimmune diseases.

headline.main: Celgene Agrees to $7.2 Billion Deal for Receptos
headline.print_headline: Celgene Agrees to Buy Autoimmune Drug Maker
